agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Juvenile Justice & Family Issues TIME & DATE: 10:30 AM or upon final adjourn./recess Wednesday, February 13, 2019 PLACE: E2.012 CHAIR: Rep. Harold V. Dutton, Jr. The Committee will hold an organizational meeting with invited testimony only to hear issues related to family law. Invited testimony only. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
